website_summaries.verdict: A fantastic starter set for hamsters or mice. This option is kitted out with 2 separate levels, allowing little critters to burrow to their heart's content without upsetting the feeding area.
pros: Transparent plastic base provides a comfortable sleeping area while still allowing pet parents to keep tabs on their furbabies
Wire upper improves airflow and offers a separate dining and play area
Solid flooring is gentle on paws
Can be attached to other habitats for additional runaround room
Comes with loads of start-up basics including a water bottle, bowl, and exercise wheel
cons: Exercise wheel might be a bit too small for Syrian hamsters
Keeping the wheel on the lower level limits the amount of bedding you can add

website_summaries.verdict: Great choice for experienced hamster owners who seek an upgrade from starter cages. Designed specifically for the needs of hamsters.
pros: Arrives with many useful feeding and sheltering accessories
cons: May be too small for larger hamster breeds, such as Syrians

customer_reviews.title: Best Hamster Buy
customer_reviews.text: Great size for my Syrian hamster. I've looked at other cages from PetCo, PetSmart, Amazon, etc.. But this beats them all. You'll just have to replace the wheel and the water bottle (easy fix). And yes I am getting a different wheel (the Silent Runner Exercise Wheel is on its way).
customer_reviews.author: AshLo

customer_reviews.title: Awesome cage for my pet hamster
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase. Cage was easy to set up; easy to clean, easy to carry. My hamster seems to love it, especially the little house that comes with it. Cage came with a water bottle, a tiny house, feeding tray, staircase, spinning wheel, and an opening to connect tubes (tubes not included). This cage is extremely convenient when it comes to cleaning it. Very happy with this cage!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend for anyone with a teddy bear hamster
customer_reviews.text: Would not recommend for anyone with a teddy bear hamster. Also it think it is too small for the smallest of hamsters. Not very big but I liked the design.
customer_reviews.author: fleischmanfamily

customer_reviews.title: Returned but Amazon was great..
customer_reviews.text: I gave this 2 stars because it is a nice cage but it says it would be good for a hamster. I bought this for our Syrian hamster and it is NOT big enough for her. Also, the wheel is very squeaky and much too small for a Syrian. If you wanted to swap out to a bigger and quieter wheel it won't fit. I really wanted this to work because it does look nice. It's much smaller than what I was thinking. Go ahead and spend the extra 15$ and purchase the Prevue 528. It is much bigger and perfect for a Syrian or dwarf hamster.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Rae Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Too small for all hamsters
customer_reviews.text: The base of this cage does not meet the minimum square inch standard recommended for all hamsters by approx. 110 inches. All hamsters need at LEAST 450 square inches at the bottom (multi-levels does not count). My Syrian began to display cage stress and after doing research I learned that most hamster cages available on the market are sadly too small. I later purchased a 40 gallon tank but plan to go even larger. Please research before buying a hamster as there is soooo much to learn.
customer_reviews.author: L.H.

customer_reviews.title: Dwarf Friendly
customer_reviews.text: Our college age daughter left her little dwarf hamster behind for a few days at her grandma's house in a fish tank. We brought her back home and combed Amazon looking for a dwarf friendly cage. Found it! Super easy to put together. She needed extra bedding by the ramp at first but eventually got the hang of it. She did not like the wheel so we have her little one on the top platform. She was chewing on the water bottle plastic so we took her old one and attached it to the outside, problem solved. The cage comes apart fairly easy for cleaning. I recommend this cage to anyone with a mini hamster!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Happy hammy
customer_reviews.text: The best out of 3 hamster cages we’ve gotten The others were just too small The price is just right We all love it (We have a Syrian hamster) We did change the wheel We have a 9 inch wheel, 2 hideouts (one is the one it came with, it’s her favorite) food bowl it came with and sand bath tray. We changed the water bottle to a glass one.
customer_reviews.author: Vanesa

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but a little smaller than I expected
customer_reviews.text: Nice, sturdy cage, but a little smaller than what the picture shows. I have a Syrian hamster and he looks a little cramped up once I put his cage assecories in his cage. This cage is better than those tiny plastic cages, which are way too small for a hamster to live a happy life. Overall, a good product for a Syrian, a great product for a dwarf or winter white. I had to get a different wheel, the one the cage comes with is too small for a Syrian. I got the 8.5 inch comfor wheel and he loves it. Btw, Kaytee tubes won't attach to this cage. He also loves his house that comes with the cage.
customer_reviews.author: Ferrari

customer_reviews.title: Very secure!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this cage. It’s spacious enough for our hampster to enjoy building her bed under the stairs. She used the house at first. The latch is great, no more midnight escapes. The water bottle seems to get tossed off often, may have to switch to rigging one outside. Can’t tell if she removes it or if it started falling out on its own. Didn’t use the wheel as ours likes the disk style best. The deep bin underneath is very nice. Only design flaw is up top, not much of the plastic lip protrudes above the 2nd floor like. Allowing some small bits to come over and on to the floor. Overall we like the cage.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Very small, maybe a little wider then a 10 gal. Tank but shorter. The plastic is very thin and flimsy and you can't use the wheel or water bottle because neither work well. I can buy a 10 gal. Tank that would only cost me $10 verses this cage that's practically the same size but less secure and this cage cost me $60. Waste of money! Important to know that this cage is more for a dwarf hamster or a mouse.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Carlson

customer_reviews.title: Good cage
customer_reviews.text: It’s A good cage. Fairly sturdy. It's a good overall size for a small home, between the usual tiny starter cage and some of those huge 4-foot cages you see on Amazon. The wheel is useless though. The food bowl is too big for the space. The lower level is kind of tight for a Syrian hamster when there’s bedding in it. The middle floor is solid plastic and seals off most of the bottom from any air flow. It's not easy to get your hamster in or out through the one too-small door on top of the cage. You can take the middle floor out and just using it as a basic, boxy cage.
customer_reviews.author: Review Man

customer_reviews.title: Wish it was a bit deeper but overall its a good cage
customer_reviews.text: This was a second cage purchase and we've really liked it. It is definitely chew proof, not just on the bars but on the plastic pieces too. We did have a little trouble putting it together but not too much. I like that it came with several accessories and it looks like Oreo (hamster) likes the middle opening the most. I expected it to overall be a bit bigger though and would have preferred the bottom half to be a bit deeper. After adding the stuffing at the bottom not much can fit on the bottom. Also if you don't use the wheel it comes with, you'll have a hard time fitting it in.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty decent hamster cage
customer_reviews.text: Overall satisfied customer. Great starter hamster cage. Has the connector hole for tubes, but doesn't actually fit any tubes we could find, so we ensure tubes stay with a little packing tape. The water bottle was useless. Purchased a cheap, effective one that we put on. The wheel our Hammie actually likes and uses nightly. Very nice it came with a little house for bedding down, food dish and wheel. Easy to assemble and very easy to clean! I wish It also had a door on the front of the cage as well as the top. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Justin and Jess

customer_reviews.title: Decent cage but do NOT use the water bottle
customer_reviews.text: Cons: Plastic bottom slightly bowed. Not noticible when cage put together. Only one tiny access door on top of the cage. Barely large enough to get my hand through. Water bottle is defective. Do not use. Does NOT dispense water. The included wheel, although the perfect size for my dwarf hamster, would be too small for a larger sized hamster. Pros: Multi level living is nice and attractive. Space between bars small enough my dwarf can't squeeze through and escape. See-through burrow area on the bottom is fantastic for see spying on the little guy. Overall, decent cage. Glad I got it.
customer_reviews.author: Matt C

customer_reviews.title: Missing pieces then replacement was damaged
customer_reviews.text: First one I ordered came without any of the extra accessories (including the cover for the hole on the side of the cage). Second one came and the plastic on the bottom section was bowed out so it wouldn’t sit flat. Third is on its way. If we could get one that’s not missing pieces or damaged, I think this could be a great cage, but I’m now having to prepare to buy something different as we’re getting awfully close to Christmas. Amazon has made it easy to return, but I expected to order and have this in a couple days, and we’re weeks later and I still don’t have what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie McElroy

customer_reviews.title: Change the water bottle ASAP
customer_reviews.text: Replaced wheel with a quieter saucer and the water bottle stinks-poor hamster couldn’t drink. Went to Walmart and picked up a $3 critter water bottle and now have a happy hamster who isn’t thirsty. We used a food bowl for the hamster by putting water in it and he easily drank like a little puppy until I was able to grab a new bottle..only a day or so.
customer_reviews.author: Robyn

customer_reviews.title: Not for Syrian Hamsters!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely NOT for SYRIAN HAMSTERS!! Too small. You have to replace the wheel with a larger one and its very hard to get to your hamster if its in the bottom level. I probably wouldn’t use it for a smaller hamster either. Not a fan of the design. Also the Instructions weren’t very helpful in putting it together. Broke my nail trying to snap the window on. Decided to go with the “prevue pet products 528” . Wayyyyyy better choice (bigger and better). And definitely not a pain in the butt. First picture is the ferplast and second is the prevue.
customer_reviews.author: angie

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in quality.
customer_reviews.text: Good size, but the upper floor is too low to the bottom. The wheel that’s attached is very cheaply made and makes way too much squeaky noise. I took it of and got a different wheel, but there’s not much room for the hamster to fit between the top of the wheel and the upper floor. Overall, the cage was way too expensive for the quality. Definitely not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne

customer_reviews.title: It's ok, but it has issues.
customer_reviews.text: The door should be in the middle of the top of cage so you can catch your animal's to clean the cage. They hide in the back and it is hard to get to them. The water bottle is way too small. Not all of the tunnels fit this cage like it said when I bought it. You have to buy their size tunnels which are very expensive. I had one of the wire pieces to break off on one side. So some of the welds are not to good. Hopefully I only will have that one to break. Up side, it is very easy to assemble and to clean. But other than that I wouldn't buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: FZ07 Lady

customer_reviews.title: Good buy not perfect for out of the box usability
customer_reviews.text: The cage itself is wonderful but there are some iasues with the accessories. The wheel is flimsy and small we replaced it easy enough. The included house also small we replaced it. The tube connector is not standard so the tubes we bought didn't fit be aware of this and if you get stuck try hot glue seems to work for us so far. The cage itaelf is large enough and made good but it is a little bit of a chore to clean You hace to take ot all apart in 3 big sections and the floor grooves is a bit of a challenge to scrub
customer_reviews.author: Larry J. Eustice

customer_reviews.title: Great habitat for teddy bear hamster
customer_reviews.text: The habitat is a great size for my Syrian hamster. The two levels give him space to run around and up and down. The 2nd level isn't too high, and he can climb up and jump down, which gives him more exercise and entertainment. Easy to clean and secure. I replaced the water bottle, but probably didn't need to. Hamsters don't drink a lot of water, so the small one probably would have lasted a week. Did need to replace the wheel - wasted money on cheap ones and ended up with a silent spinner. My hamster and I are happy with this cage.
customer_reviews.author: Juliaah

customer_reviews.title: Perfect cage!
customer_reviews.text: This cage is awesome! We have a young fancy Syrian hamster and she loves this cage. The multi-floor format gives her a lot of room to run around. After reading the reviews, I did purchase a larger water bottle, deeper food bowl, silent wheel, and an igloo house. In the photos, please remember they were purchased separately. The wheel arrived cracked, but as I didn’t plan to use it, I didn’t contact the seller. Everything else was pristinely packaged and in excellent shape. I highly recommend this cage. The clear bottom and open-air top really allows for maximum interaction with your pet.
customer_reviews.author: L. Noll

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful design and spacious. BAD WATER BOTTLE THO
customer_reviews.text: Received this today and absolutely love the overall design. I have a dwarf hamster who was bored with her home so we upgraded. So far so good. I think it's easy to work with and will be easy to clean. It's def spacious. Lego is running around and enjoying the new found space. I wish the water bottle was better secured but it is ok. EDIT!!!! WATER BOTTLE WAS NOT WORKING! MY POOR HAMSTER! I NOTICED WATER WAS NOT GOING DOWN SO RAN BY FINGERS OVER BALL AND NOOO WATER. I PUT HER PREVIOUS WATER BOTTLE IN THERE AND SHE RAN RIGHT UP AND DRANK FOR 2 MIN STRAIGHT! BEWARE OF WATER BOTTLE.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The cage arrived in less than 24 hours in PERFECT condition. This is a REALLY nice cage for ...
customer_reviews.text: The cage arrived in less than 24 hours in PERFECT condition. This is a REALLY nice cage for 1 Syrian Hamster. Like "Moving on up"! My BIG Syrian Hamster absolutely LOVES this cage. You will never find a cage of this quality in a chain Pet Store! That said, you wiill have to replace the Running Wheel and Water Bottle as they appear to be designed for Dwarf Hamsters. I am VERY pleased with this purchase. I have since purchased a 2nd. I just throw away the bottle and wheel and set aside the 2nd floor and it is PERFECT for 1 Syrian Hamster. Not sure why pulled/discontinued?
customer_reviews.author: Lloyd Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: Happy Hamster!
customer_reviews.text: See photos, he stays in the tubes in the day even has a food stash in one of the dead ends, at night he roams. apartment in one of the high round rooms he used the other as the toilet. Added the tubes on had to get creative where it connects to the cage. The cage is great, simple but gives him more room, I did replace the wheel for a quiet one. This cage was the best I could find anywhere and I looked........
customer_reviews.author: The hvac

customer_reviews.title: My mice love it!
customer_reviews.text: I have two pet mouse ladies, and they seem to love the expanded floor space from their 10 gallon aquarium. They love climbing the bars and racing up and down the ramp between floors! Bars are definitely spaced small enough for normal adult mice to not escape. I did end up not using the wheel, mostly because I already had a silent running disc that fits in the space in the bottom, which my girls prefer. The other accessories - little house and food dish, have been met with mousy approval though, they seem to love sleeping in the house.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan A Van Zandt

customer_reviews.title: excellent cage for a dwarf hamster
customer_reviews.text: I got this cage for my dwarf hamster and it's great. Essentially 2 floors, on the 1st one, I pretty much put lots of stuffing where my hamster likes to butty herself and dig. There are plenty of space to place many accessories. The cage comes with a wheel, water bottle, food dish, and a little house. My sweet little guy is using all of them. Loves his little blue house. Sleeps there every day. The wheel is great, just the right size for my dwarf. If you have a bigger hamster, you would need to replace the wheel for a bigger one. Love this cage!
customer_reviews.author: Lana

customer_reviews.title: Good space, crappy wheel and water bottle
customer_reviews.text: I feel like this is pretty escape-proof in terms of hamsters go. I can’t get the wheel attached correctly so it isn’t spinning, and my baby Syrians can get the water out of the water bottle. I’ve had a squeeze it so they can try to lap it up. It’s not very tall, so not very many water bottles will fit.
customer_reviews.author: cheynmeister

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work out of box
customer_reviews.text: The included wheel is a joke and it's impossible to properly install bigger wheel without breaking the plastic. The included wheel is very small and very wobbly. It makes loud noise when hamster uses it. To install larger wheel you have to remove some strong sharp plastic. Caution! It cuts fingers easily!
customer_reviews.author: Valentin Konovalov

customer_reviews.title: Great in every way EXCEPT somehow
customer_reviews.text: Great in every way EXCEPT somehow, someway, we had three instances where a dwarf hamster escaped (how?!? Through the bars? Somehow through a corner? We can’t figure it out) and TWICE a hamster got eaten by our cat. The lid was locked shut with a combination lock, because we didn’t want our kids playing with the hamster without us knowing, but still the hamster escaped. No Idea How.
customer_reviews.author: Maya

customer_reviews.title: Wow, perfect in every way
customer_reviews.text: I've had hamsters for years and I've never found a cage as great as this: clear bottom tray keeps bedding inside and allows quiet viewing of our little Pepper. The large base gives her ample horizontal space to burrow and run. She can access the open wire area via ramp or just climbing through the "wheel atrium". We replaced the mfgr's wheel with a super silent one we like better -- lucky for us, this cage's wheel mount allows for different wheel mechanisms of diff sizes!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend this to ally new hamster owners
customer_reviews.text: My Hammie loves it. I ended up getting rid of the wheel, it was way too squeaky. The bottle drips but she likes using it so I have a coaster under it. The tube connection isn't well built. I bought some Kaytee tubes and you literally have to force them in. But sometimes it comes undone over time. Luckily, my winter white isn't strong enough to get out that way. I would buy again. I would recommend this to ally new hamster owners. I bought a smaller cage due to money. But ended up buying this too since my Hammie got too bored with the size and started chewing the bars.
customer_reviews.author: thetaPC

customer_reviews.title: Not for Syrian hamsters
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our new hamster and thought it would be a big enough space for him. Unfortunately I think this cage is made for a dwarf hamster rather than a Syrian one. Our guy loves to chew the bars. From what I read this is due to either stress or boredom. We opted to build our own larger habitat from a plastic bin so there will be no bars to chew. Bummed that we are out of 60 bucks. Wish that the description would include what size hamster this would be appropriate for.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wires came off!
customer_reviews.text: Side wires came off, the welding broke?? cage Size is OK, setup is small for a syrian hamster. The bottom base is too shallow. This is best suited for a smaller hamster. The wheel in the middle of the cage limits the overall floor space. I wish It came with tunnel tube already instead of having to order them by pieces as they are pricey. I wish I had kept the box so I could return it.
customer_reviews.author: Brav

customer_reviews.title: Too small!!!
customer_reviews.text: My hamster escaped today and almost died by pushing the top of this cage open. Should have a locking mechanism that’s stronger. Additionally this is really too small and doesn’t meet the us standard for floor space for hamsters. Wish I had known that going in as 2 months later I’m now buying a new cage.
customer_reviews.author: K.

customer_reviews.title: Happy customer!
customer_reviews.text: We loved the cage. It was easy to assemble. The wheel was too small for my Syrian so we bought a bigger one. The water bottle worked perfectly fine and Coco will not drink from another. She empties it pretty fast so I will try to get another just like it. My daughter can see and interact with her Coco because of the clear bottom. It is also very easy to clean. Overall we are satisfied with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great cage
customer_reviews.text: We really like this cage- and we went through several before this one. It’s a nice size family it our Syrian hamster. We don’t use the middle platform because we have a bigger wheel and a “hideout” for our hamster. It works fine without the middle platform if you opt to forgo it as well. Very easy to assemble and clean. I LOVE that the depth of the bottom part is deep enough that the bedding doesn’t escape the cage when the hamster burrows. That’s a big plus to me!
customer_reviews.author: A. McClune

customer_reviews.title: Upgrade from a much smaller cage
customer_reviews.text: My hamster is much happier in this large cage. However, there is only one door located on the top of the cage. I ended up dremeling a few bars and using a wire door from an old cage to create a door on the side of the cage so that I can feed my hamster by hand or allow her to get out of the cage. The hamster wheel was too small , so I did end up purchasing an Exotic Nutrition Silent Runner hamster wheel. Otherwise, I am happy with the size and the layout of the cage.
customer_reviews.author: JMarie

customer_reviews.title: Very nice cage with one flaw
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great cage with excellent use of space. It’s super easy to put together and very easy to clean it. However one major issue. The little stairs it comes with to get to the second level are a joke. I have two gerbils in this cage and in one week this is what’s left of the stairs. In a few days they won’t be able to get to the second level anymore. They should have been of metal like the top half of the cage. I attached a pic to show what happened.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: awesome modern townhouse for your pet
customer_reviews.text: we love this cage so far for our dwarf hamster - the 6yo can open it and clean it on his own and it inst overly complicated or finicky like other cages we have tried. my -1 star is because the tube connector is not compatible with other brands! and all the accessories for this brand are expensive and not that fun looking, i was hoping to be able to connect our old tubes and accessories to this one but no luck :(
customer_reviews.author: Misty Everard

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: This cage is pretty nice! I researched for a long time to find a decently priced, available in the US, and user friendly for my 8yr old to clean by himself. It was super easy to assemble. Lots of room for our Syrian to play. Deep bottom for him to burrow and keeps the bedding in. Will take some getting use to only accessing him from the top hole but that's almost a nonissue. We put in our own 9in wheel and we could easy fit a larger one. We also used our own water bottle and food dish. Overall, I'm very happy with my purchase. I gave it 4 stars because of the small accessories.
customer_reviews.author: M. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Chewed a hole. Sad.
customer_reviews.text: As much as we LOVED this cage, our hamster managed to do this overnight one night. We were so upset as this isn’t an extremely cheap cage. I require my daughters to keep a “hamster piggy bank” for issues like this. They were sad to have to spend their savings on a new cage on a whim, but I suppose it’s a life lesson on having a rainy day emergency fund. We are just glad we noticed the hole before she got loose.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Great Cage
customer_reviews.text: My child was gifted a Syrian Hamster for Christmas, and I wanted to upgrade her cage because the one she came with was too small. I picked this one because I liked the space available, and since our little one was a climber, I liked the idea of two stories for her. The wheel that came with the cage was too small for my Syrian, and it broke while I was trying to remove it. But the other wheel I had attached easily to the cage and fit fine. Still working on finding attachments for the cage; but other than that I'm very happy with this cage for my hamster
customer_reviews.author: ARaymond

customer_reviews.title: It’s a great cage but not the best bottle and wheel
customer_reviews.text: I really like this cage for my dwarf hamster because of the size of the cage. However, I had discovered that the water bottle wasn’t even working and it really worried me. I tried everything to fix it yet it didn’t work so i had to buy another one. Also, the wheel is not sturdy and makes a lot of noise. it felt as if my hamster couldn’t run because the wheel would start wobbling too much. i ALSO had to buy a separate wheel for that. Other than that, it’s a good sized cage and my hamster has a lot of space to play.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Way more room than most cages but hard to find attachments that fit
customer_reviews.text: PROS: My Syrian hamster seems to like it, super easy to put together/take apart and I really like that the bottom is clear since our hamster loves to burrow! It also has an opening on the side so you can add tubes/attachments if you want 👍 CONS: The opening for the attachments is larger than most tubes so it's hard to find ones that fit. (I ended up attaching mine with tape and a little thread) I also took out the running wheel since it takes up a lot of space and is too small for a Syrian hamster.
customer_reviews.author: Lakeli

customer_reviews.title: I really wanted to love this cage
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love this cage, especially for the price. It does give the hamster more room, as it is double-decker. The water bottle is terrible, we just used the bottle that we already had. My least favorite feature is that there is only one door, and it is on top. If you have a skittish hamster, GOOD luck getting him/her out. My daughter's ham is very friendly, but it is still awkward to reach in and pull her out through the top. The bottom is flimsy--it is harder plastic, not rubbery, but thin. So far she has not escaped from it, which is a plus.
customer_reviews.author: KTherese

customer_reviews.title: OVERPRICED for the quality or lack thereof
customer_reviews.text: This is a cute little cage for dwarf hamster as long as he gets to come out into a bigger playpen however the price is much too high for the quality. Quality is about two Stars. It should be more about a $25 cage. Every accessory couldn't be made any cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Great cage, swap out wheel and water bottle.
customer_reviews.text: Great cafe for our Russian dwarf hamster. I agree with other reviews...I had to sandpaper the stairs as she slid down on first try. I also traded out the wheel for silent spinner which mounted perfectly in the same spot. Also had to swap it water bottle but kept the holder it can with. Overall a great value. Cage is easy to clean and I love that the bottom is see through so we can see her in her fav spot.
customer_reviews.author: jen

customer_reviews.title: NOT GOOD FOR GERBILS!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Send this back right away! Gerbils NEED to burrow and this is WAY TO SHALLOW to do so. We quickly replaced it with a fish tank and bought a "topper" with ladders and ramps to put the wheel in , food and water dish etc. And the gerbils were so happy to go way down in the stuffing and build their trails. They were so confused and stressed when we had them in THIS habitat. PLEASE- DON'T BUY FOR GERBILS.
customer_reviews.author: health101

customer_reviews.title: Not for gerbils!
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: do not buy for your gerbils. My gerbils have ruined the entire cage. So much that they started chewing holes in the bottom of it. They also managed to chew the tube part off and escape! We had a very close call with our cats. They are now residing safely in a fish tank with a high rise on top. This is a great cage. However within weeks my gerbils were able to eat the stairs and the wheel (which was on the small side anyways). I made a few adjustments and they seem pretty happy.
customer_reviews.author: Mommy Of 3

customer_reviews.title: Great but buyer beware!
customer_reviews.text: Love this cage. Cookie, our hamster, is very happy. However, please make sure they are actually getting water from the bottle. We had to replace the new one because he was literally chewing at it trying to get water out of it. We pulled it out and noticed nothing was coming out. He was lethargic for a day, but luckily I noticed he was struggling with the water bottle or he would have died. He is happy now. Just beware of the water bottle! Could have been a fluke when it was made. But just be aware.
customer_reviews.author: Whimsicaldork

customer_reviews.title: Great idea, too small for Syrians
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this cage - easy to set up, love the clear lower portion so you can spy on your hamster while they play, but our Syrian chewed the bars out of boredom all night. Ultimately, I ended up making a bin cage which cost about $15 and is about twice as large and our hamster loves it. This one might work for much smaller breeds.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Warner

customer_reviews.title: Great cage.  You might consider replacing the wheel.
customer_reviews.text: We love the cage. It has a great layout and it is easy to clean. The wheel was a bit squeaky, had an odd tilt, and I couldn't modify it to be any better so I replaced it with a $30 silent standing wheel that has ball bearings. Now our cage is complete.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Kiel

customer_reviews.title: Hamster Paradise
customer_reviews.text: My hamster was so frustrated in her Crittertrail cage that my husband and I had to figure something out without dishing up to 150 dollars for a Qute cage (which we really want). We extending her current cage with Crittertrail tunnels and this Ferplast cage placed underneath. She seems to enjoy the extra space and freedom to run around. Since the tunnels don’t fit perfectly into their ferplast opening, we jury-rigged a piece of Crittertrails tunnel with a rubber band and a tiny bit of Elmer’s glue. It’s been sturdy since and the hamster has been in and out of both enclosures fine.
customer_reviews.author: Piyu Sen Miglin

customer_reviews.title: Very nice set
customer_reviews.text: Very well packed, survived the trip from Italy. I'm using this for two dwarf hamsters and the is plenty of space for both. They went a little crazy when they were first put into this cage, they spent most of the first day trying to get out. Now they love the space. I did swap the wheel for another brand as i couldn't get the center point all the way in ( which made for a noisy night). This cage went together easily and it's easy to clean. The one con is that the on my access to the cage is a small door on top, i wish the door was on the front. I would definitely buy this again!
customer_reviews.author: mark602

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Cage
customer_reviews.text: Excellent cafe for my dwarf hamster. She LOVED this new cage. It literally took less than 10 mins to put together from the time I got it out of the box to my hamster running around checking her new home out. Everything is easy to clean, it comes with a food bowl, water bottle, and wheel too. It’s the best cage I’ve seen on Amazon. I’m buying another one for my second hamster.
customer_reviews.author: ~KJM~

customer_reviews.title: Great habitat for our Syrian hamster. But prepare to buy another wheel.
customer_reviews.text: Great habitat for our Syrian hamster. I like top floor being a solid plastic because he likes to go potty in the corner and it is easy to clean. The bad thing about it is the wheel, it is way too flimsy and I could not get it to stick to either the wire cage walls or the plastic wheel hanger. I ended up buying another wheel that can stand up in the wheel space opening.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Can I get other colors?
customer_reviews.text: A bit expensive for the size compared to other(simpler) cages but I guess since it's a set of items that ups the price. Still a great size though considering my long haired siberian hamster is huge, huuuge! Only issue I have is that the second level floor is solid plastic and thus traps in any urine odors. This is worrisome considering it takes two days before a hamster has it's fresh bedding smelly again, even with a designated pee area. Arrived intact with no cracking in the plastic bottom case.
customer_reviews.author: To the moon

customer_reviews.title: Easy cage
customer_reviews.text: Great starter cage ! Easy to assemble and also easy to clean. Wasn't sure if the wheel could hold my haters.weoght but we moved it to the top floor and it works perfect. Got a slightly bigger water bottle and the bottom.of the cage is perfect to fill with bedding. She still bites the side of the cage every now and then but we add new toys and she's happy. Great east starter cage.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Z.

customer_reviews.title: Planet fitness for hamsters
customer_reviews.text: Awesome work out pen for my monster hamster but he's starting to really scare me..should he be flexing and growling at me when I walk by. My hamster loves this cage not only does it sound like he running a full fledged gym in there bangin the weights around and running non stop on the wheel but now he can climb the walls and monkey bar across the top of the cage too.
customer_reviews.author: BKM

customer_reviews.title: Water bottle is junk!
customer_reviews.text: I only gave the cage 2 stars because of 2 things. The water bottle is junk the bottle won't stay in it's holder and my hamster pulls it out everytime he drinks so i use electrical tape to hold it. And also the cage needs more height! Also why can't they make a decent water bottle?
customer_reviews.author: MARKTHEHAMMER

customer_reviews.title: Great Cage For A Fair Price
customer_reviews.text: This is hands down the best Hamster Cage on Amazon. The other cages are either too small or have really crappy cheap plastic parts that can be chewed through. The only bad things about this cage are the water bottle and the wheel that comes with it. Both are absolutely trash and should be replaced upon receiving the cage. The wheel is too small for Russian Winter White Dwarf hamsters and makes them run with an arched back (REALLY REALLY BAD for the hamster) and the water bottle is just a piece of trash that doesn't function well enough to keep your hamster hydrated (The ball gets stuck sometimes and water won't pass through).
customer_reviews.author: Netasha

customer_reviews.title: Good option improved w some modo
customer_reviews.text: This cage is great when comparing sizes to other options, however, I had a few complaints which is why I gave it 4 stars. The water bottle works well. Food dish is nice. Sleeping house opens up for easy cleaning. The wire part comes off easily and is sturdy, hamster isn't getting out. The plastic parts could snap easily and of you've been researching its the same for the big brand cage. The 2nd floor option I did not like bc hamster pee would seep under onto the ledge it sits on and STANK. The wheel was too small for a strain hammy.
customer_reviews.author: dr^2 mom

customer_reviews.title: Love the cage but the accesories are not great
customer_reviews.text: I love this cage, it is big enough for our Syrian hamster and it doesn't take a lot of space. However, the water bottle is too small and has a plastic layer that my hamster ate completely in one day, luckily she is fine. Super easy to clean and safe for our hamster. The little opening at the top to get the hamster out is small but our hand fit and we are able to get her out. The hideout is a little small for Syrians but she uses it a lot. The food plate is fine.
customer_reviews.author: MsPR

customer_reviews.title: Yes Its Worth It
customer_reviews.text: I was originally suspicious of the mixed reviews. Now that we own it my son thinks it the best! His single long-haired Syrian hamster loves it. He packs the bottom level with bedding (similar to the assembly picture) while the top level is generally where he lives. Personally I think he loves the space (compared to other cages). He climbs all over the place. He doesn't use the wheel much; instead we have a ball. Best part is that it easily disassembles for a cleaning every 2 weeks - very, very convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Philly T-bone

customer_reviews.title: Great cage!
customer_reviews.text: Got this cage for my son’s first hamster. It was more than the other name brand cages price wise, but is built much more sturdier, and better quality. We have the comfort of knowing our hamster won’t be able to escape like I read on the reviews of the more popular ones. Roomy enough for the hamster and plenty of room to add stuff to the cage. My only complaint is that the wheel it came with didn’t work, so I had to buy a free standing saucer, but other than that we love the cage.
customer_reviews.author: Roberts420

customer_reviews.title: Great cage
customer_reviews.text: Well, the hamster loves it. As they have no depth perception he tried to jump to his death a few times, but my daughter kept moving him to the ramp and he quickly learned to use it. The wheel is still really small, so if you have a Great white whale sized hamster like we do, you'll need to order a larger one. He loves the house. And he hasn't escaped from his cage like he constantly did his last one. So that alone is enough to give five stars
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Hall

customer_reviews.title: Damaged product, cheaply made and packaged badly.
customer_reviews.text: Received this item about two weeks ago. I decided to open it and set up so I could make sure everything was okay before giving to daughter Christmas morning. When opening it the corner was broke of the black plastic part that separated the to sections and the wheel was split in half. I can’t find away to get ahold of seller for new parts. When I try to return it or get replaced parts it wants me to just send back. I tore the box getting it open making it difficult to ship everything back. I’d like to just have the parts replaced or my money returned. I’m
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Cheap for the price
customer_reviews.text: This cage is not cheap in price but it is cheap... doesn't feel sturdy. The wheel won't even hold the weight of my dwarf hamster. This is at minimum for dwarf hamster size, was hoping to add tunnels, we will see some say can only use ferplast which will suck if true because they are crazy expensive for one tube...the same price as a pack of 4-6 tubes from other brands. I only bought because our hamster is an escape artist and the bar spacing was better on this cage. But so far I am far from impressed. Would not recommend this cage.
customer_reviews.author: tim kraker

customer_reviews.title: Great two story hamster cage
customer_reviews.text: This wire/plastic small animal cage is perfect for a single mouse or hamster. It was easy to assemble and clean. The bottom is plastic and the top is wire which a great for ventilation. It comes with a wheel, house, food dish and water bottle. Because it is two stories, it is compact but more room for your little creatures. Good value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Baby Lou

customer_reviews.title: Perfect starter set for beginners
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice sized cage and gives pleanty of room for a drawf hamster. My son's new hamster loves the cage. The water bottle is small but perfect for the drawf hamster. The lower level provides a nice area for burrowing. The opening in the top of the cage is a bit small to try and catch the hamster and does become a little challenging when it comes to cage cleaning time (my only reason for 4 stars) all in all great cage for an all in one set up.
customer_reviews.author: CJShoffner

customer_reviews.title: Re: wheel assembly, push extremely firmly and beforehand, add a drop of oil to ensure quieter use.
customer_reviews.text: My son’s hamster loves this cage. He’s a long haired Syrian and he fits great in the wheel, in the house and the water bottle last at least a week. We actually decided to “potty” train him with the bed that came with this and bought him a seperate wooden bed to sleep in. (There are videos on YouTube on how to potty train. Sounded ridiculous to me but it actually worked.) You have to be sure to push the button in very girly in the wheel and it is very quiet. The two floor living is a great advantage to this type of hamster. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa B.

customer_reviews.title: Unimpressed with material quality, deteriorating after first month from animal urine.
customer_reviews.text: It is easy to assemble. Clean and durable, low marks. After the hamster established her waste corner, her wet waste etched the plastic, and the scent is always present. My opinion, the plastic is too soft and not of a good quality to stand up to the acidity of the animal waste. Dissatisfied to pay this much and already looking for the next purchase. Hope this lasts a year.
customer_reviews.author: S. K.

customer_reviews.title: Throw the water bottle away!!!
customer_reviews.text: First off I love this cage. Very roomy for toys and critters who like to burrow. But the tube opening is in metric and only Ferplast tubes will fit. WARNING: Throw away the bottle that comes with this cage. It didn't work! I wondered for almost 3 days why my hamster wasn't drinking anything. It was because no water was coming out! Even though I tapped the ball when I put the bottle in and it worked initially. Don't risk it. It also has rubber around the nozzle part that she chewed and ate! Very bad design... So, only 4 stars for dangerously dehydrating my hamster!
customer_reviews.author: Bernadette Pierce

customer_reviews.title: The water bottle and wheel did not work!
customer_reviews.text: The hamsters (full-grown Syrian and babies) could not use the water bottle, since the ball was too hard to push, and the wheel did not work. The wheel is also too small for anything but a dwarf hamster. Unfortunately, another person I know who adopted a hamster pup bought this habitat had the same issues with both items!
customer_reviews.author: JerseyGRL

customer_reviews.title: Best house yet
customer_reviews.text: This is our 3rd house and so far it’s the best for our teddy bear hamster. It would be perfect if it were 6-8” taller. That being said, I modified the house slightly. Our hamster dislikes every wheel we have bought him, in fact he uses it for naps. In place of the wheel we are using his log ramp so that he can get to the top level. I also removed the plastic ramp as it did not give him the space he needed to climb up. We may have to play with the configuration to see what best works for him.
customer_reviews.author: WildSassyPants

customer_reviews.title: Cage is great but the water bottle does not work!
customer_reviews.text: I love the cage and so does my little guy BUT the water bottle that came with the cage was not working and I didn’t realize it for the first couple days! So the first 3 days he didn’t get any water! I put his old bottle in the cage and he drank for about 5 minutes straight! So I would recommend getting a different water bottle
customer_reviews.author: Toni

customer_reviews.title: Perfect spacious hamster cage
customer_reviews.text: Great hamster cage! I love that the base holds all the litter in and that it’s wide and deep to allow my hammy to burrow. It only took a few minutes to assemble. My only complaint is that I can’t hang the water bottle from the outside for easy removal to refill and clean. The spout is too wide to fit through the narrow bars.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Woodruff

customer_reviews.title: Great cage, would recommend!
customer_reviews.text: This cage is great for small critters. As I read with other reviews, you will probably want to upgrade the wheel to a bigger one. You can buy a free standing one and sit it on the lower level. It will extend into the top level through the center hole. Comes with pretty much everything you need! Food bowl, small water bottle and a house. Very easy to move from room to room! Highly recommend, especially for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Brad S.

customer_reviews.title: Great humane cage.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice cage, If you live in usa and need ferplaat tubes, I recommend buying another cage that comes with them, its more affordable than purchasing seperatley.
customer_reviews.author: jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Great for Syrian hamster! Spacious! User friendly!
customer_reviews.text: I've bought 3 different cages from 3 different vendors at both PetSmart, PETCO, and Amazon. My Syrian hamster was just too large. This cage is perfect for him, you can tell the difference, he actually enjoys the space and setup this time. Super easy to put together and easy to clean! I did not use the wheel included, it's too small for our hamster (Fluffy), but what's great about this cage is that it has enough room to put a slightly-larger wheel comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: J.E.Z.

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous cage for the amount of money that was spent!
customer_reviews.text: The directions were very hard to follow since there were only illustrations and no words, however it wasn't that hard to figure out. My only complaint was the fact that the wheel that came with the cage is not only small, but it's cheaply made and doesn't move easily. I had to buy a separate stand alone wheel to put in place of the original one.
customer_reviews.author: simone

customer_reviews.title: Warning!  Don’t trust water bottle!
customer_reviews.text: My son’s new hamster suffered a week with insufficient water and died dehydrated and emaciated! Issues with the water bottle are mentioned as far as 4 years back! I only wish I’d read further and realized sooner. Poor sweet little girl. She hid the symptoms until too late. Breaks my heart. We were first time hamster owners and I researched and researched. I’ve had a horse, iguana, dogs, cats, ferrets, but not hamsters. So many thing are great about this cage, but a defective water bottle is deadly and inexcusable. If you buy this cage, do not trust the water bottle.
customer_reviews.author: N. Seeling

customer_reviews.title: I really like the space the 2 floors give in this cage
customer_reviews.text: I really like the space the 2 floors give in this cage, and it is sturdy and secure. The only small complaint is the wheel. It is ok to listen to when Genghis is jogging on it, but when he really gets going, it rumbles the whole cage. Probably because it is attached to the plastic upper floor, which is sitting on top of the plastic bottom. I might try putting a towel or something under the cage to see if that will decrease the rumble. Or I will replace the wheel in the near future.
customer_reviews.author: marci h

customer_reviews.title: Spacious but be aware if anything default is not working
customer_reviews.text: Great cage for hamsters. They love spacious rooms and plentiful places and toys to explore. Bottom part is transparent plastic so it keeps them warm and observable too. Easy to install, easy to clean. Cons: Caution! The default water bottle did not work as well as it should be. My hamsters were extremely fatigue due to dehydration. Had to hand-squeeze the water bottles to give them enough water. We ended up buying a different water bottle that's larger and water flows more easily from it. Overall great product, just need to be aware if anything is not working as well as it should.
customer_reviews.author: Yuan-Yih Eric Huang

customer_reviews.title: Great cage! I originally bought a cheap plastic tube ...
customer_reviews.text: Great cage! I originally bought a cheap plastic tube cage from a popular pet store. It was not safe. Scared the hamster would get out. And he barely fit in the tubes. I added a large plastic tube from amazon inside this one. Our teddy bear hamster does not enjoy wheels so we just took it out. To clean is easy. Just dump the old bedding from the first floor & wipe down. It keeps my dogs & cats out, & the furry little guy in! The first floor is plastic, and slept slightly bendable. You want to take care not to step on it or get to crazy putting it back together.
customer_reviews.author: Oregon11

customer_reviews.title: Good starter cage
customer_reviews.text: This should be a starter cage for pet stores instead of the tiny crap they usually sell. At first my hamster would dive off the top platform, but now he likes using the ramp. I placed bedding all around and behind the ramp to make it seem less steep and scary. The wheel was the perfect size for my dwarf baby, but I anticipate him outgrowing it. It was a little noisy too so I replaced it with a silent spinner. I wish it was a little cheaper, but I'm not ready to take on a diy cage which would be the only best alternative.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Great cage with lots of space..
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy using this cage with our dwarf hamster. It provides her lots of room to run and a deep tray for us to fill up for her to dig her tunnels and such. the middle tray is semi-fragile. While cleaning i dropped it and it cracked the edges (but I dropped it so thats on me) but it has held up really well through out multiple washes and extended use. The rest of the components (base and cage) are really sturdy and durable.
customer_reviews.author: Aly Miles

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our hamster.
customer_reviews.text: The cage is perfect for our Mr. Coconut he just loves it. There were just a few things we changed we placed his house which fits just fine on the bottom of the cage and the other house would be fine for the smaller hamsters we have a Syrian and we also changed the water bottle. He didn’t seem to like the one it came with. So we have just put it away just in case. Also added a larger wheel and we plan on adding more tubbing in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Big space, easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Our hammie seems very happy in it. It is awesome size for a dwarf hamster, we have a Chinese. She runs around everywhere, uses both the floors.. she even likes to hang upside down from the ceiling and walk the bars like that! Easy to clean.. and just, feels a lot more humane than the cramped spaces she was kept in at the pet store!
customer_reviews.author: calico27

customer_reviews.title: Great Size, kinda pricey
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I didn’t like about this cage was that it was chipped on one of the sides. Everything else was in good condition. I did however struggle with the wheel, when putting it in the middle it wouldn’t stay, it just kept falling down. Eventually I put it on the cage wires and it stayed titled a bit. Overall it’s a nice cage but I will update later once my winter white hamster gets use to her cage. UPDATE: my winter white hamster managed to get out, I don’t understand how since there’s no space big enough and the cage was covered on top. Still a good cage since I’m able to see her at the bottom
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Leal

customer_reviews.title: Not great.
customer_reviews.text: The wheel is useless as many people have said, it will not turn and it's too low and rubs against the floor of the cage, only one small area to add in another wheel, smaller than expected, the top floor is hard to open, it's hard to pick up your pet also I don't know about the water bottle, I'm not risking him being unable to drink from it so I put a different one in there, which was also difficult. Also my hamster is afraid to go up and down the ladder. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great beginner cage
customer_reviews.text: We really like this cage set up. My daughter was able to bond easily with her hamster since this cage does not have a ton of items in it. The only issue we had was her hamster was able to chew a very small hole in one of the corners before we caught him. We have since used a filler and a house over top to stop the continued destruction.
customer_reviews.author: BBC

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: Cage was filthy when I opened the box. Looks like it was a return but it wasn’t even cleaned out prior to being reshipped and there were still old hamster shavings stuck to the bottom of the cage. Two of the pieces that hold the wheel on were broken and only three out of four of the legs that the cages rests on were in the box.
customer_reviews.author: Tessa

customer_reviews.title: Great cage, accessories, not so much
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son's Syrian. She LOVES it. A few things that should be noted. Get a wheel and water bottle. The wheel would be OK for a dwarf, and the water bottle is a fine toy for a pretend stuffed animal. Otherwise... useless. The home is fun, easy to take apart, my 9 year old can do it. She loves her cage, and doesn't try to escape. Which is amazing. The first day she was monkey baring, and chewed on the bars. Haven't seen that behavior since.
customer_reviews.author: EH

customer_reviews.title: Great cage!
customer_reviews.text: This cage is amazing! Easy to put together and our hamster LOVES it! The bottom allows so much room for burrowing. However, I do wish the design of the opening at the top was more in the middle or larger to allow easier access to clean and pick up the hamster. That would be our only con so far.
customer_reviews.author: B. Koon

customer_reviews.title: Spacious and pretty
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my dwarf cuz I'm really bad at DIY. This is the best-looking cage with decent space that I could find online. Turned out my little guy loves it. Bottom level is deep enough for large volume of bedding, and the top deck has alot of space for additional toys. Only caveats are that the wheel can be squeeky, and at some point I will need to change to a bigger one when he grows up; and better settle the water bottle outside (with the nozzle sticking into the cage), as my hamster keeps chewing on the plastic part that the nozzle broke :(. Overall it's a very good product.
customer_reviews.author: Helena Shen

customer_reviews.title: Worth it. Paul loves this!
customer_reviews.text: Great for what I need. Paul Is a short haired hamster not to chubby. He loves this cage. Its a good size and he is always active in here. The things I did not like about this is the water bottle is way too small. I still use it but you need to fill it up about 2x a day(at least for me) and I dont like that there is only one opening on the top. I would have liked to have one on the side also. The little house is good but Paul doesnt use it to sleep in, he uses it as his bathroom. Which is fine with me. Super easy to clean!!!
customer_reviews.author: james

customer_reviews.title: Good cage at a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: Our hamster loves this cage. It is spacious and has two stories for her to run up and down. This is truly a great “condo” for little pets. The only thing I am not happy with (not about this specific cage, but more about every cage) is there is not a base to catch all the bedding shreds. Our hamster likes to snuggle at the corner and the bedding shred is all over on the side around the cage.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi Nielsen

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Great cage for our Teddy Bear Hamster - we had started out with one of the smaller cages, and quickly realized he needed more room. The double layer really gives him space to explore and play. There is space for a wheel on each level and a hut on each level. The second level is plastic - I couldn't tell from the photos if it was wire or plastic, glad to find out it is indeed plastic with a wire looking pattern.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Lewis

product_meta.title: Favola Hamster Cage | Includes Free Water Bottle, Exercise Wheel, Food Dish & Hamster Hide-Out | Large Hamster Cage Measures 23.6L x 14.4W x 11.8H-Inches & Includes 1-Year Manufacturer's Warranty
product_meta.description: Exhausted from searching for a hamster cage that is large enough for your hamster? Then search no more! The two story Favola Hamster Cage by Ferplast is larger than most hamster cages on the market today and is a modular design so you can connect onto other habitats or play areas. This hamster cage is fully equipped with everything you need to get started including a hamster wheel, food dish, water bottle & hamster hide away. The large extra deep 4.75 inch base eliminates bedding from scattering around the cage and caters to your hamster's instinctual desire to burrow by providing approx. 340 sq. inches of space. The entire hamster cage measures 23.6L x 14.4W x 11.8H inches & the 5.5 inch exercise wheel is conveniently placed between the two floors (exercise wheel can easily be removed in order to upgrade to a larger wheel). The ladder & top floor are solid plastic and safe for hamsters. The top wire portion of the cage features a durable black coat which is rust resistant and the safe 1/4 inch horizontal bar space to keep the smallest hamster breeds inside the cage. The entire hamster cage comes with a 1 year manufacturer's warranty on all parts. Refer instruction manual for troubleshooting steps.
feature_bullets: Hamster Cage Includes 2 Spacious Floors | First floor is a deep 4.75 Height inches to promote playful borrowing w/ a Hamster friendly plastic ramp (no pinched toes) for easy access to the plastic top level where their food dish, water & hide away preside
Fully Equipped & Modular Designed Hamster Cage | Favola includes a food dish, water bottle, hide away, 5.5 inch exercise wheel & a connecting port for play tubes to connect to other hamster cages
Easy Maintenance Hamster Cage | Top panel features an access door & entire wire portion & middle plastic section of the cage disconnects from the transparent base for easy cleaning access

Large Living Space | Hamster cage measures 23.6 Length x 14.4 Width x 11.8 Height inches, deep base measures 23.6L x 14.4W x 4.75H (approx. 340 sq. inch base), wire top mesh is 1/4 inch wide, exercise wheel is 5.5 inch diameter
Quality Guarantee | Favola hamster cage includes a 1 year manufacturer's warranty on all parts

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
